high_descs: walk straight and turn right when getting to the white desk. Stop at the dresser
Pick up the cup that is in the back from the dresser
turn around and then turn back around facing the dresser
turn the lamp on that is on the dresser
anns.task_desc: pick up cup while turning on lamp that is on dresser

high_descs: Walk straight to the table, turn right and walk to the dresser
Grab the bowl in the back
Walk to the left a little
Turn on the lamp on the dresser
anns.task_desc: Grab the bowl from the dresser, turn on the lamp

high_descs: Walk straight toward the desk and then make a right at the end of the bed and walk to the dresser at the end of the bed.
Pick up the bowl that is beside the lamp.
Turn around to the left and face the window letting sunlight shine into the bowl.
Turn back to the dresser with the bowl in hand.
anns.task_desc: Picking up a bowl from a dresser.
